content: i designed this beautiful and unusual afghan while i was waiting for the birth of my second child it was very pleasing to work on as the due date drew nearer and nearer - then passed i began to worry that he wasn t coming until his blanket was ready but he proved he was just taking his own sweet time by waiting an entire week after i d finished it to grace us with his presence years later it is still cherished by my dear little boy and i hope you ll love it too
